creditline: Bequest of Mr. and Mrs. Northrop Dawson, Jr.
description: standing woman with flowing draperies, with scarflike portion of her garment forming a circle behind her head; woman wears a pale blue headdress; garments are tan, pale green, and muted red; pale green dragon at right with portion of landscape behind it; inscription in ULQ; embossing; received framed
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper with embossing
title: Benten, Goddess of Wealth and Fertility, with her Dragon
